tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Didn\'t teach relevant material pertinent to what we were supposed to cover for each week. Bad class time management. Evidently had to cut out activities all the time due to her own ramblings and tangents. Doesn\'t answer questions properly. Has snooty rationales like "because I said so". Despite not properly teaching, she expects very much.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I noticed her treating some student really horrible, and her favorites she was nice to. If she doesn\'t like you, she will ignore your questions and request for assistance. If she likes you, she will spend a lot of time assisting you. This is not conducive to a neutral learning environment. Other instructors are so nice! She really scares me.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Firstly, I want to say it was a fantastic experience with her. If you are ready and and well prepared, you will definitely succeed this course. She provides you with such good references you will need throughout the semester. Prepare a big binder :) Remember she is big on infection control and agency policies!! Enjoy you semester with her!

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Narcisa was amazing! In the clinical setting she is always there to help her students. She is always trying to find great opportunities for her students in the hospital setting. She supports her students through the good and bad times, her presence was always a pleasure! Just don\'t hold back and you will thrive and be recognized for it!

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Narcisa was very supportive and made every effort to ensure all students had a chance to practice their skills. She\'s easy to talk to and isn\'t judgmental when she asks you about your patient but know how to find information when you don\'t know something. Don\'t be afraid to ask her for help and think critically based on your assessments to succeed

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Narcisa is a fantastic instructor. Her explanations on skills and rationale in clinical are spot on. She spends most of her time during clinical seeking out skill opportunities for her students and bends over backwards to promote our learning experience. If you know where to access information and convey confidence, you will learn & grow a lot.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Narcisa is very terrible and I too have been subject to her abused...If you witness Narcisa mistreatment of another classmate and you do not support that classmate and you remain mute (because you\'re scared or you feel its not your issue), then you too are part of that abuse. Isn\'t nursing about advocacy? Why complain here and not where it matters?

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Honestly, after having Narcissa for the first time in my very first semester, I felt as all of my other instructors that semester and thereafter are "angels" compared to her. She needs to go back to school and learn how to treat others with respect. Btw, she doesn\'t really teach. It\'s all, self learning.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I have been in her class and I have witnessed her treating others unfairly. If you are someone she does not like, she will single you out as a target for mistreatment, she will not assist you as she does others and insult you infront of others. I has yet to see her explain things other than to say "its in your text book."

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Narcisa was my professor in class (lab 1100) and also my clinical instructor. She is tough but fair. Do your readings, pay attention, and come with open mind and readiness to learn. She is a great professional and has tons things to share: just be willing to receive.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I had Narcisa for my first clinical experience and I thought she was great. She is not there to constantly be telling you what you should already know. She is hard and sometimes unfair but if you come prepared, pay attention and listen to her feedback, you\'ll do great. She\'s tough but is actually quite a lovely person! I learned so much from her.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Although Narcissa is really nice to me and often compliments my work, however she has caught my attention of treating other students with the out most disrespect. She does not teach and prefers to always tell us to read our text books. She teaches too little, yet expects alot. She treats me well.. but I recommend to avoid taking her classes.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Not that I have anything against Narcissa, but she is an awful teacher. I\'ve had her as an instructor for two semesters now and all of those bad evaluations that the student give her she doesn\'t take it to consideration. My other colleges with other instructors learn much more than ones in my section. So unfortunate for us.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Why is she allowed to teach. As the clinical instructor, she is suppose to demonstrate to students and allow them to practice guiding/correcting them to the proper techniques whenever necessary, well she doesn\'t. She talks for most of the class on powerpoint presentation and then we were asked to practice on our own without her guidance!!

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Horrible teacher. Very unorganized, chooses favorites- if you aren\'t her favorite, you\'ll go through hell. Knows 0% of the content she\'s supposed to teach. Disrespectful to some students. Unprofessional, class is a waste of time- take someone else if you can!

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Narcisa has a very demeaning personality and is constantly making her students feel as though they know absolutely nothing. She puts students down and makes them feel stupid for ever asking for her opinion or any kind of help. Clinical with her is hellish. :(

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
